message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe this product will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I see the value in the product, but I have a budget in mind. Would you consider $800,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you have a budget in mind, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,000,000, but I'm not willing to go lower than that. I'm confident you'll find the product's value justifies the price.
